page.title: 10NINEWELLS HOSPITAL, DUNDEE
page.content: {Ninewells Hospital}and{Medical {School}was opened by the Queen Mother in 1974. It is unique in that it is the first teaching hospital to be planned since the start of the N.H.S. to include a medical school as an integrated part of the hospital itself. It has a chapel, a hairdresser, a large laundry department, a cafe, a restaurant, sports facilities, labs and an animal house. It has{15 operating theatres, 5000 {employees,960 patients, 830 beds and {25 miles of corridors.}There are 40 beds to each ward; the wards are numbered 1-40, but there is no Ward 13. There are 11 different floors. The annual cost of patient care is{ {Â£22 million.} Currently, there is extensive drug rehabilitation research going on.
